title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Face mechanization in bord and pillar and longwall mining. Top coal caving, Layout of faces, face equipment; conveying and supporting systems their selection and organization. Thick seam and steeply inclined mining methods. Wongawilli system, Room and Pillar extraction system, Hydraulic mining of coal seams. ,underground coal gasification.
